questions.question: What is 'Whistleblowing'?
options: Playing a musical instrument in the office
Reporting illegal or unethical activities within a company
Hiring new employees from a competitor
Quitting a job without giving notice
questions.answer: Reporting illegal or unethical activities within a company

questions.question: A 'Conflict of Interest' occurs when ______.
options: Two employees disagree on a project
A person's private interests interfere with their professional duties
The company loses money in a new market
The manager gives too much work to the team
questions.answer: A person's private interests interfere with their professional duties

questions.question: Which reporting verb is followed by a gerund?
options: Agree
Refuse
Suggest
Promise

questions.question: Choose the correct sentence:
options: He denied to take the bribe.
He denied taking the bribe.
He denied take the bribe.
He denied for taking the bribe.

questions.question: What is 'Corporate Social Responsibility' (CSR)?
options: A legal requirement to pay corporate taxes
A business model that integrates social and environmental concerns
The responsibility of employees to socialize together
A marketing strategy to sell more products
questions.answer: A business model that integrates social and environmental concerns

questions.question: The CEO promised ______ (to address / addressing) the shareholders' concerns.
The consultant recommended ______ (to conduct / conducting) a full ethical audit.
What does it mean to 'adhere to a code of conduct'?
options: To write a new set of rules
To follow the existing rules strictly
To ignore the rules when they are inconvenient
To teach the rules to others
questions.answer: To follow the existing rules strictly

questions.question: Which verb is followed by an infinitive?
options: Recommend
Deny
Admit
Refuse

questions.question: 'Sustainability' refers to ______.
options: Maximizing short-term profits
Meeting current needs without compromising future generations
Using only the cheapest materials available
Expanding the business as fast as possible
questions.answer: Meeting current needs without compromising future generations
